부장로 케스커:
Trooper is a profession reserved for Kamael men only. At this level, you must choose whether to develop strength of spirit or body.
You will learn how to control and manipulate the dark power hidden within ourselves.
Our weapons are Ancient Swords and Rapiers -- necessities for learning advanced skills at this level.
트루퍼가 되는 방법을 듣는다
돌아가기.
